name: whois-freaks
label: Whois Freaks
description: Whois Freaks provide well-parsed and structured domain WHOIS data for all domain names, registrars, countries and TLDs since the birth of internet

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Specify the URL of the WhoisFreak server to connect and perform automated operations

fields.name: api_key
fields.title: API Key
fields.description: Specify the API key configured for your account using the WhoisXMLAPI.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.

operations.title: Get Whois Lookup
operations.description: Whois Lookup is a tool will gives users access to complete historical WHOIS records, including domain ownership and registrar information over time

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.name: domainName
parameters.description: The domain for which live WHOIS data is requested

parameters.title: Whois Type
parameters.name: whois

Reverse.title: Keyword
Reverse.name: keyword
Reverse.tooltip: Retrive the domain that have specified keyword. At least one parameter is required from "Keyword", "Email Address", "Owner" or "Company"
Reverse.description: Retrive the domain that have specified keyword

Reverse.title: Email Address
Reverse.name: email
Reverse.tooltip: Retrive email address of the specified domain. At least one parameter is required from "Keyword", "Email Address", "Owner" or "Company"
Reverse.description: Retrive email address of the specified domain

Reverse.title: Owner
Reverse.name: owner
Reverse.tooltip: Retrive the domain that have specified owner. At least one parameter is required from "Keyword", "Email Address", "Owner" or "Company"
Reverse.description: Retrive the domain that have specified owner

Reverse.title: Company
Reverse.name: company
Reverse.tooltip: Retrive the domain that have specified company. At least one parameter is required from "Keyword", "Email Address", "Owner" or "Company"
Reverse.description: Retrive the domain that have specified company

Reverse.title: Mode
Reverse.name: mode
Reverse.tooltip: Reverse Whois lookup API lets you query in two modes. 1. Default Mode. 2. Mini Mode.
Reverse.description: Reverse Whois lookup API lets you query in two modes. 1. Default Mode. 2. Mini Mode.

Reverse.title: Page Number
Reverse.name: page
Reverse.tooltip: Specify the page number to get next or desired page of whois information
Reverse.description: Specify the page number to get next or desired page of whois information

parameters.tooltip: Live - results in getting the latest WHOIS record even if it's incomplete, Historical - results in getting the historical WHOIS record and Reverse - results in getting the reverse WHOIS records
parameters.description: Live - results in getting the latest WHOIS record even if it's incomplete, Historical - results in getting the historical WHOIS record and Reverse - results in getting the reverse WHOIS records

operations.title: Get DNS Lookup
operations.description: Retrieves DNS Lookup for a specified domain name from Whois Freaks. A DNS lookup provides a domain’s corresponding IP address from its 'A' record as well as the domain’s mail server (MX record), nameserver (NS record), SPF (TXT record), and more records.

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.name: domainName
parameters.tooltip: Name of the domain whose DNS Lookup information you want to retrieve from Whois Freaks.
parameters.description: Name of the domain whose DNS Lookup information you want to retrieve from Whois Freaks.

parameters.title: DNS Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.tooltip: Select Multiple Types to retrieve records
parameters.description: Select the lookup type based on which you want to retrieve records from Whois Freaks.

operations.title: Get SSL Certificates
operations.description: Obtain a domain name’s Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) certificate and trace its complete SSL certificate chain to reveal potential inconsistencies and misconfigurations that may translate to exploitable vulnerabilities. A single SSL Certificate Chain API query provides details that can ease your security enrichment efforts, allowing you to know which domains are trustworthy and which are not

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.name: domainName
parameters.description: The domain for which ssl certificate is requested

parameters.title: With Chain
parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: If true, allows you to get all domain certificates sorted from the end-user to the root one
parameters.tooltip: If true, allows you to get all domain certificates sorted from the end-user to the root one

parameters.title: SSL Raw
parameters.name: SSLRaw
parameters.description: For getting the raw openssl response of the domain. Default value is "false"
parameters.tooltip: For getting the raw openssl response of the domain. Default value is "false"
